full_text: @gilesvangruisen in DOM it doesn’t matter in which order listeners on different nodes are registered. bubbling always goes from children to parents. since react’s own native listener (which calls all built-in prop listeners) is technically on the root, it fires after all child native listeners.

user.name: дэн
user.description: less complex, more complete

full_text:
@gilesvangruisen yes, prop listeners = built-in.

the sequence is:

- native child
- native parent
...
- native root <== this is react’s listener
  - react calls child prop listener
  - react calls parent props listener
